name: FxLightingAPI_v3
desc: An API you use to get information about lights in a scene in a Motion project.

items.name: func lightInfo(UnsafeMutablePointer<FxLight>!, forLight: Int, at: CMTime)
items.desc: Provides information about a light at a particular time.

items.name: func numberOfLights(at: CMTime) -> Int
items.desc: Retrieves the number of lights at the passed-in time.

items.name: struct FxLight
items.desc: A structure that contains lighting information.

items.name: var kFxLight_V3: Int32
items.desc: The version number of the lighting information.

items.name: var FxLight_CurrentVersion: Int32
items.desc: A property used to define a lighting information structure as being the most current version.

items.name: struct FxLight
items.desc: A structure that contains lighting information.
